The claim made by Kamala Harris was that: as many as 300,000 autoworkers may be out of a job before the end of the year."

The Center for Automotive Research: CAR) study, which Harris referred to, projected a worst-case scenario of up to 366,900 total job losses "economy-wide," not limited to autoworkers. The figure of 300,000 autoworkers losing their jobs before the end of the year was not what CAR was projecting.
